CONFIG.name: Upper char
CONFIG.description: Minimum a char must be in upper case

CONFIG.name: Lower char
CONFIG.description: Minimum a char must be in lower case

CONFIG.name: Number
CONFIG.description: Minimum a char must be a number

CONFIG.name: Change from last
CONFIG.description: The new pwd must be different from the lastest

CONFIG.label: changepwd.change_first
CONFIG.name: Change at first login
CONFIG.description: The pwd must be changed at first login

CONFIG.name: Expired time
CONFIG.description: Number of days fo the expiration
